DOC.brief_summary: The steep trendelenburg position pneumoperitoneum laparoscopic surgery potential cause adverse effect respiratory mechanic gas exchange . Autoflow-volume control ventilation may improve lung compliance reduce airway peak pressure . Therefore , aim study evaluate whether Autoflow-volume control ventilation improve gas exchange respiratory mechanic patient undergo robot-assisted laparoscopic radical prostatectomy .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Volume Controlled Ventilation Autoflow-volume Controlled Ventilation Robot-assisted Laparoscopic Radical Prostatectomy With Steep Trendelenburg Position Pneumoperitoneum
DOC.criteria: 1 . Adult male patient schedule elective robotassisted laparoscopic radical prostatectomy undergo general anesthesia 1. chronic obstructive respiratory diseases 2. heart failure 3. body mass index ( BMI > 30 kg/m2 )
